name: Arrested Waters
description:
You wake up on an unfamiliar shore, not remembering how you got here. There was... a ship? You stand up and gather yourself, only to find a man standing over you.

Welcome to Arrested Waters!

A game about a shipwreck survivor that must gather resources, explore dangerous islands, and fight enemies to upgrade their boat and escape the island.

CONTROLS:

Player turns in the direction of mouse

Left click - Shoot / Swing Axe

Right click - Aim Gun

W/A/S/D - Up/Left/Down/Right

M - Toggle Map

Left Shift - Dash

E - Interact

F - Upgrade Ship

***NOTE***

It is recommended to download the game should you have trouble with WebGL or performance. The only downloadable version is for Windows, as we do not have Mac machines available to build on.

CREDITS:

Sounds from: https://freesound.org/ 

BGM from: https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/ 

Water Texture from: http://www.textures4photoshop.com/
